description: Psychiatrists, psychologists & family, marriage, & child therapists providing best integrated mental health treatments using EEG-based diagnostics, TMS, Neuromodulation, medication, and psychotherapy in San Francisco Bay Area with intensive outpatient treatment (IOP and PHP) for addiction,
cleaned_text: A team of psychiatrists, psychologists, and expert specialists when you need more... for your emotional wellbeing. We help you understand your symptoms. An integrated treatment plan is designed for you. We work with you toward recovery and health. We help you maintain a healthy mind. CLINIC NEWS HOW WE HELP Addiction Treatment of Addiction and Co-occurring Disorders We believe in understanding the underlying issues and figuring out what's motivating the addictive behaviors that trigger multiple disorders. ADHD Attention Deficit and Hyperactivity Often adults suffer professionally and in relationships from undiagnosed ADHD. Education, behavioral treatments, and psychotherapy treatments are the most effective for adults with ADHD. Anxiety Generalized, Social, OCD, PTSD, Phobias Treatment for anxiety disorder includes generalized anxiety, social anxiety, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), and specific phobia. Bipolar Disorder Severe Mood Swings Bipolar disorder requires psychiatric treatment as soon as possible and needs to be under psychiatric medication supervision. Borderline Personality Suicidal and Self-Injuring Behaviors Borderline personality disorder (BPD) is a serious mental illness, and those who have BPD suffer from unstable moods, impulsive and reckless behavior, and problems with relationships with other people. Depression Treatment-resistant Depression As many as two-thirds of people with depression aren't helped by the first antidepressant they try. Up to a third don't respond to several attempts at treatment. Eating Disorder Anorexia, Bulimia, Binge Eating Disturbed eating is one of the most lethal psychiatric disorders that can be managed with proper treatment. OCD Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder OCD is a chronic condition, and if left untreated, it can be disabling interference to all aspects of life. Schizophrenia & Psychosis Schizophrenia, Hallucinations, Delusions, Paranoia Seeking psychiatric treatment for schizophrenia and psychotic and disturbed thinking is daunting for most people. Our goal is to make this process as easy, helpful, and educational as possible. Trauma & PTSD Post Traumatic Stress Disorder Trauma experiences often involve a threat to life or safety, but any situation that leaves a person feeling overwhelmed and alone can be traumatic, even if it does not involve physical harm.
